original_text:
Does a bird fall in a snare on the earth,
    when there is no trap for it?
Does a snare spring up from the ground,
    when it has taken nothing?
korean_text: 덫을 땅에 놓지 않았는데 새가 어찌 거기 치이겠으며 잡힌 것이 없는데 덫이 어찌 땅에서 튀겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Does a bird fall in a snare on the earth,
when there is no trap for it?
Does a snare spring up from the ground,
